question: What is the total revenue for the year 2023?
gold_sql: SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM orders WHERE extract(year from order_date) = 2023

question: List the top 5 customers by spending.
gold_sql: SELECT c.name, SUM(o.total_amount) as spending FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY spending DESC LIMIT 5

question: Show me the monthly sales trend for 'iPhone 15'.
gold_sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', o.order_date) as month, SUM(oi.quantity) as sales FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE p.name = 'iPhone 15' GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
